name: UBOX
intro: NFT marketplace in the Asia-Pacific region
introduce: Ubox is an NFT trading platform based on an Eastern cultural perspective, providing a secure, diverse, and high-value trading experience for digital asset enthusiasts in the Asia-Pacific region. It inherits the success and customer base of top cryptocurrency brands, bringing new vitality to the NFT ecosystem by gathering a broader range of high-quality IP creators, brands, artists, and collectors.
